Class UiHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.fredin.gravitation.utils.UiHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class UiHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Helper class for handling UI screens.
    Author:
    Johan Fredin

        xPos - The x position of the image.

        width - The width of the image.
        height - The height of the image.
        Returns:
        A new image with specified width and height at a specified position.

      • getImage

        public com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image getImage(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin,
                                                java.lang.String nameOfImage,
                                                float xPos,
                                                float yPos,
                                                float width,
                                                float height,
                                                boolean addToStage)
        Gets a new Image with a specified width and height at a specified position.
        Parameters:
        nameOfImage - The name of the image in the pack file.
        xPos - The x position of the image.
        yPos - The y position of the image.
        width - The width of the image.
        height - The height of the image.
        addToStage - true will add the image to the stage.
        Returns:
        A new image with specified widht and height at a specified position.

      • animateActorAndFadeOutScreen

        public void animateActorAndFadeOutScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actorToAnimate,
                                com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actorToFadeOut,
                                float buttonFlashDuration,
                                float fadeInDuration)
        Flashes the actor touched and fades out the screen.
        Parameters:
        actorToAnimate - The actor to be affected by interaction.
        actorToFadeOut - The actor used to fade out the screen.
        buttonFlashDuration - The duration the pressed button will flash.
        fadeInDuration - The duration for the fade effect used after button flash is finished.

      • animateActor

                float buttonFlashDuration)
        Flashes the actor touched 3 times.
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor to be affected by interaction.
        buttonFlashDuration - The duration the pressed button will flash.

      • flashActor

        public void flashActor(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor)
        Creates a fade in out effect that repeats forever and fades in and out the actor at a fixed value of .75 seconds.
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor to be affected.

      • flashActor

        public void flashActor(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
              float fadeTime)
        Creates a fade in out effect with specified time that repeats forever.
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor to be affected.
        fadeTime - The time fade in and out will be used.

      • getScale

        public float getScale()
        Get a specified scale for mobile and desktop applications.
        Returns:
        0.5 scale if this is a mobile device, 1 otherwise.

      • getScale

        public float getScale(float scale)
        Get a specific scale weather game is on a mobile device or not.
        Parameters:
        scale - The scale to use if game is being played on a mobile device.
        Returns:
        The scale if mobile device, 1 otherwise.
